sentences.english: About music, is clearly one of the characteristics of the Chuanqi art.
sentences.chinese: 講究音律，顯然是傳奇藝術的特徵之一。

sentences.english: The twisted pair line also extremely has between each kind of equipment connection is fastidious.
sentences.chinese: 雙絞線在各種設備之間的接法也非常有講究。

sentences.english: Microsoft, the emphasis is on innovation capability.
sentences.chinese: 微軟講究的是開拓創新能力。

sentences.english: The Chinese people stress tosend gifts in pairs, for odd numbers are regarded as inauspicious。
sentences.chinese: 中國人一般講究禮品成雙，因爲奇數被視爲不吉利。

sentences.english: How to own a car, but also a stress learned.
sentences.chinese: 可怎麼養車，也是有講究有學問的。

sentences.english: Sanitation is the best way to prevent germs from spreading in massage therapy.
sentences.chinese: 按摩療法中，講究衛生是阻止細菌傳播的最佳方法。

sentences.english: Women have better rest rooms. They get the nice chairs andred carpet。
sentences.chinese: 女人的衛生間很講究，那裏有精緻的椅子和紅地毯。

sentences.english: Maybe, if he was really dapper, he got his nails buffed, too.
sentences.chinese: 如果是非常講究的男人，可能還會拋光指甲。

sentences.english: General attention is paid to mountains and waters, pavilions and terraces.
sentences.chinese: 一般都講究有山有水，有亭有臺。

sentences.english: A lot can be said for pipers and tin whistlers.
sentences.chinese: 說到風笛和六孔笛，有很多講究。

sentences.english: Lamaism is characterized by elaborate rituals and a strong hierarchical organization.
sentences.chinese: 喇嘛教的主要特點是儀式講究，等級森嚴。

sentences.english: She's extremely house-proud, keeping all the things hanging on the wall in high tastes.
sentences.chinese: 她特別講究家裏的擺設，牆上掛的東西都是很考究的。

sentences.english: The meat is focus on slice.
I never in my life saw anything more elegant than their dresses.
sentences.chinese: 我生平沒有看見過任何東西比她們的衣飾更講究。
